The notification keeps popping up that my lander is out of electricity. Evidently, the landing gear has blocked the solar panels.

No matter how many times I close it, it comes back on. I cannot turn them off.  I'm going to have to destroy the lander just to get it to stop.

I just drag the whole notif window to bottom right corner. Most of it gets hidden.

But they definitely need to add option to turn it off,  same with PAIGE even if the save is in 'first time user mode'.
